setting.label: $LOCALIZE[31752]
setting.description: Display 1 widget with multiple rows and widget selection button

setting.description: Display multiple widgets with 1 row per widget

setting.description: Display multiple widgets with multiple rows

setting.label: $LOCALIZE[1223]
setting.description: Do not auto rotate the widgets

setting.label: $LOCALIZE[31307]
setting.description: Only rotate the spotlight widget every $INFO[Skin.String(widgets_rotate_delay)] seconds

setting.label: $LOCALIZE[31499] 1
setting.description: Rotate the first widget (if assigned) every $INFO[Skin.String(widgets_rotate_delay)] seconds

setting.label: $LOCALIZE[31499] 2
setting.description: Rotate the second widget (if assigned) every $INFO[Skin.String(widgets_rotate_delay)] seconds

setting.description: Rotate the third widget (if assigned) every $INFO[Skin.String(widgets_rotate_delay)] seconds

setting.description: Rotate the fourth widget (if assigned) every $INFO[Skin.String(widgets_rotate_delay)] seconds

setting.label: $LOCALIZE[31730]
setting.description: Rotate all widgets (including spotlight) every $INFO[Skin.String(widgets_rotate_delay)] seconds

setting.label: $LOCALIZE[31731]
setting.description: Use the shortcuts editor to enable rotation for a widget

setting.label: $LOCALIZE[1223]
setting.description: Never show tags on widget

setting.label: $LOCALIZE[305]
setting.description: Always show tags on widget

setting.description: Let skin decide based on content/artwork
